Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to removing the fee for a sex offender to make a change to his or her registration with the division of criminal justice services
Summary: Relates to removing the fee for a sex offender to make a change to his or her registration with the division of criminal justice services including fees for changing their address, or any change to his or her status of enrollment, attendance, employment or residence at any institution of higher education.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to removing the fee for a sex offender to make a change to his or her registration with the division of criminal justice services
